      • getImposedStatus

        public java.lang.String getImposedStatus()
        Returns:
        the status imposed on this gauge. If this property has a non-null value, it supersedes the status computed by computeStatus().

      • setImposedStatus

        the status associated with values below the first threshold

        public javafx.beans.property.SimpleListProperty<Threshold> thresholdsProperty()

      • configureWarningAndErrorThresholds

        public Gauge<P> configureWarningAndErrorThresholds​(java.lang.Number warningThreshold,
                                                   java.lang.Number errorThreshold)
        Convenience method for configuring a gauge with three operation modes: ok, warning and error. If warningThreshold < errorThreshold, the ok mode is associated with values below the warningThreshold. Otherwise, with values above the warningThreshold.

      • computeStatus

        protected java.lang.String computeStatus()
        This implementation uses the thresholds to determine the status. Subclasses may override this method to provide alternative ways of computing the status.

      • createDefaultSkin

        protected javafx.scene.control.Skin<?> createDefaultSkin()
        This implementation returns a ThermometerSkin. It may be overridden by subclasses, but the preferred way to set the skin is by setting the CSS property '-fx-skin'.
        Overrides:
        createDefaultSkin in class javafx.scene.control.Control
